text: Boris Komnenić (; 29 March 1957 – 6 March 2021) was a Serbian actor.Boris Komnenić He appeared in more than sixty movies from 1980 until 2011. He was known for his roles in Days of Dreams, Taiwan Canasta, Dancing in Water, The Misfit Brigade, The Belgrade Phantom, When I Grow Up, I'll Be a Kangaroo, Loving Glances and Novogodišnje venčanje. Komnenić died on 6 March 2021 in Belgrade, aged 63. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1957 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Serbian movie actors
title: Boris Komnenić
